rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports the creation of a program using neutral language.
The segment reports a factual action/history ('created the National Animal Disease Preparedness and Response Program').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment provides background information but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
